smg.text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 9 pm ~ 1 am due to astronomical tide. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
